After installing the game, run the patches.
Start with the file ending with 1010, then 1012 and so on.
1060 and 1070 files are in folders, go in to these folders and run UpdateTitle (TitleUpdate file doesn't work).

Then just copy everything from the Crack + Xlive DLL folder to your installation directory. 

All done. From the installation folder, run "LaunchGTAIV.exe" not "GTAIV.exe"
